Perhaps I just need to buy one of the newest phones out to in order to get functionality from this app that would closely rival the actual mess...Full ReviewEven at good internet speed and clear signal, it still freezes and lags. Shame on you - sure the size comparison is massive against full bloated FB messenger, 9.60MB on my phone, but...!  What about Facebook's own Messenger Lite?
